entry.title: The difference between Coal Preparation and the Metal Preparation
entry.content:
Most of what I learned in university is coal processing, though my major is called mineral processing. And trully, I just learned fewer knowledge about other mineral’s processing than coal. But the company’s business is more relative about metal. And there was mineral processing training these days. It is about mineral, especially metal. After the company’s train and learning in school, I want to talk about the things about the difference between coal and metal. And I want to tell you directly, There is no difference originally.

Some teachers’ mislead

Neally all teachers in CUMT tell us most of the CUMT’s courses are about coal. Though there are courses about non-metal minerals, iron and smelting, though some teachers disagree.

But they ignore one thing, the methods to prepare minerals is the same.

There is only one teaching material about Mineral Processing in China

Not only the method is the same, but the teaching material. I found the students from NEU, CUMTB, HPU who learn Mineral Processing were all using the same book Mineral Processing edited in chage by Xie Guangyuan. Who is the dean of my college.

The same mechines are used in metal and coal

Jinjing, Haiwang, Derick the same companies are chosen to choose the mechines during directing plant. In old time, I think there is a lot of difference between designing a mineral praparation plant and a coal preparation plant. After the train, I found it is not, most of the companies’ mechines are for coal or metal or other minerals.

In other words, I hope the graduate from CUMT remember our school’s name is CUMT not China’s University of Coal and Technology. And I hope the social, the non-coal preparation plant trust graduate from CUMT. We can not only prepare coal but also metal, non-coal.

entry.title: Seven Days' Train
entry.content:
I did not worked in 7 Days Hotel, not lived in ‘7 Days’ either.

Because the company prepare 7 days to train us, freshmen.

What we do between the train, is learning and knowing each other.

And you know, I am not very good at making friends, or remember new guys. So, in the first several days, I did not do well at knowing each other. But in the last several days, when we knew more about each other, our relashionship is more close.

Most of time, I did not drink to avoid being drunk, this time, I drink some beer. When you drink, you want to talk, so I talked more than ever, but I still have clear mind to control my mouth.

Let us walk honestly, as in the day; not in rioting and drunkenness, not in chambering and wantonness, not in strife and envying. —Romans 13:13

And between the 7 days train, there are 2 teachers/ministers’ talk I can not forget. One is the minister of planning department — Mr Wang, the other is the vice general manager —Mr Fan.

Wang talked one book—Secret, the book belongs to New Age Movement. Before I left CUMT, at the last church meeting, Duan taught us how to distinguish heresy. And she remind us of the New Age Movement and the book Secret. Maybe Mr Wang is member of the Party, maybe he is not. But what he talked really did not suit the communism, or athesim, and did not suit the Christianity either. And I really want to talk about the religion with him, make him know Jesus.

As Mr Fan, he is smart. He talked a lot. About value of man, about wealth, about work, his experience and so on. And one thing he talked make me remember him. He said “Men need Belief, professing a belief in Christianity is more than without belief.” And as this word, I do not know wether he has join the Church meeting, and I did not know how to reply, or how to explain the difference of the belief he said and the belief beliver profess in. So I said nothing, and just listened.

And Fan said men shouldn’t attach great importance to wealth, I agrre with him about this, though I am not wealthy. But, after his word, some one express different opinion, said his opinion is all by he is already wealthy.

Men need belief, China needs belief. But communism is not a belief, money is not either.

entry.title: A Muslim Girl I Know
entry.content:
There is a Muslim girl in company. I kind of knew her, but she did not. Because when we were still at school to find jobs. I saw her a lot of times in application meeting. And sometimes she introduce herself, I was still at the meeting. And got some information about her. Of cause, I did not do this by purpose. Maybe she did not remember me. But I remembered her. Because she is a Muslim and a Hui nationality girl, and has a boyfriend who is Han nationality, and she had joined one and only one students organization —Stage Show Organization. And you know I am fan of CUMT Stage Show.

I did not knew her came to the same compony as me until I found her name in the QQ group. And I had talked to her about why came here so far away from her home, she replied me she got this offer firstly.

In one application meeting, I found her is in too. And the HR asked her about her religion and what she is different form Han nationality girl. I generally remember she replied although she is a Hui nationality girl, but after she came to the university, she eat with classmates who are not Muslim, and she has a boyfriend who is a Han nantionality boy.

Though the HR did not say his opinion, did not say why he did not accept her. But that time I felt the HR rejudice her. Not rejudice her grades, or her appearance or her ability. He rejudice her religion. He worried the difference between Han and Hui will make some mistake in the fulture in the compony, though she said she already adopt Han’s traditions and habits. The HR’s worry is not gone.

Why I write this and why I remeber this, because one day when we ate in the same desktop. I found when she ate, she just eat a few kinds of dishes(without pork). Maybe when she came dfmc’s application meeting, she did not emphasize her religion. And the company did not prepare the Islamic food for her. And when I saw this, I really really symphathize her. And I really want to tell her what you eat or waht you did not eat can not make you be saved, or make you be liked by God.

I wanted to, but I really do not know how to, and dare not to. I am a Christian, when I introduce myself, I will tell the listeners, including her, a Muslim. And she is a Muslim, she did not emphasize this. But when she sat before the desktop, I really can not understand her feeling or her thoughts about the food with pork.

I want to help her, not because she is a classmate of mine, not because she is a pretty girl, just because I want to, and not only her, but also the Koren over the river, and the men who did not believe the God……

May God bless.

For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life. —John3:16

entry.content:
I bought a train ticket from Heb to Dandng, though I can not get on the car in Heb City. Because I found I can buy a sleeper ticket from Heb, not from my hometown. So I bought this ticket.

A few days later, when I went to get the ticket, I found I mmade a mistake, the ticket I bought is a student ticket. But you know I am not a student anymore. So the functionary asked me for the student card, I could not gave it. So what I can do is getting a refund for the ticket. And buy a chair ticket from my hometown. What the puzzle I will face with is I need sit on a chair more than 9 hours during the night. It will make me tired.

Before I leaving home, I pray to God for my travel, my safety and my job.

I arrived at railway station about 6 pm, but the arrving in the raiway’s time is about 5 hours later. So I went to Wanda Cinema to watch Transform 4. Though the ticket is expensive.

This is my first time to watch Transform.

When the time is up, I went to the station to get on the railway. When I was on the railway, I found the functionary said there is an opportunity to buy a sleeper ticket. So I queue, although there is someone jumping the queue, There is an amazing thing happen, I bought the sleeper ticket, the last one.

When I get the sleeper ticket, I went to the sleeper car. I through many sleeper cays. Some has a very bad smell from someone’s feet. I said in my heart I do not want to meet the one with bad feet smell. Finally, it did. But I found another bad thing, someone near me snored with a very big noise. I could not wake him up, we did not know each other. What I can do is praying, like Hu said his experience with his roommate, I pray for my sleep time. It worked, subway started, I fell in a sleep until the nexr day’s morning.

And there was another thing happen, when I queue to buy the sleeper ticket, I bought the last one, The functionary said, I got an amazing phone number and the ID number and the ticket number. And you know I bought the last sleeper ticket.

Am I lucky?

No! It is all on God’s blessing.

The school ask us to leave by 6.23, I left at June 23. I wanted to leave at 21. But I change the plan to decide to leave at 6.23.

I took the railway and the taxi to home.

There are cleaner air in hometown than Xuzhou or other cities I had visited in China.

But you know the time to work is coming. So there is not much time for me to stay in hometown. And I still had a Toefl test to take.

Guy from South China on Railway

When the railway is arriving My Province, the guy in a lower berth spoke something to another one. And I talked to him about trifles.

After the talk, I found goal is near my home. But the difference is that I need take a taxi, but he wanted to ride a bike to the destination. He graduate from Guangdong and worked in Nanjing before coming here.

Girls near my berth

There are 6 berthes right of my berth. After arriving my destination I found there are 3 girls who knew each other, and 2 girls who knew each other, and 1 elder women who is not like a student. You know that 3 girls always talked. And I just listen, they talked boyfriend, wealth, life and so on. And you know it is a time to listen, to listen girls’ thoughts and feelings.

Family left of my berth.

On the left of my berth, there is one family, one daughter, one father, and one mother. The daughter is just like me, graduated from college and went back home. They live in Liaoning Province. The daughter studied in Nanjing. And theis pronunciation is kind of like Ma.

Summary

This travel maybe is the my last travel from Xuzhou. My students who still in Xuzhou they saw me off, and Sha, Hu, Ji did too. Really thanks them.

But I did not cry, though I was sad, I was reluctant to leave the fellowship, the friends, the Bible Group … When Dai asked me when I will be back to the fellowship. I answered maybe never. But Ji corrected me. He said we at last had one chance to see each other, we will see each other in the heaven. I said a wrong word. His correct is right.

entry.title: Rhinoceros in Love
entry.content:
Every year, Stage Play Corporation in CUMT put a stage play. This year, my last year in University, the stage show is called “Rhinoceros in Love”, and the four years in university, I watched the stage show from this corporation 3 times, this is the third time.

The first stage show I watched in CUMT is called “暗恋桃花源” in Chinese, the second was “红玫瑰与白玫瑰”, writed by Ailing Zhang, the title means “Red Rose and White Rose”. You know, all these three are about love.

This time getting a ticket of the stage show is more difficult than ever. There are 3 times to send the free tickets in the camp, I went twice but got nothing. So I gave up to watch the show, cause the third sending tickets was at Wen Chang Camp, I did not want to go so far to get the ticket.

But on Saturday, I had no intention of talking about the show with Ying at the fellowship when she finished cooking the dinner, she said she would do ask her friends as best as she can. At night back from fellowship, I send a message to Yan to remind her and asked her about my harmonica’s show’s time, after she sent back, I sent a message to ask about the show’s ticket, cause I knew she do some students’ job, and I knew maybe she had tickets.

She told me she want to watch too, but she did not get the ticket either. So I slept, cause tomorrow I wanted to join the praying in the morning. And shutdowned or airplaned my tcl and huawei phone.

I woke up about 6 am on Sunday, and I did not watch the phone.

On the road to the fellowship, I saw Ren, but he walked so fast that I could not get him, after I turned right out the sourth gate, I heard some steps, and I turn back, there is a girl, Yan. She told me maybe I did not receive the message she sent, I took out my phone from my pocket, I found she told me she get 2 tickets and invite me to watch the show.

What a surprise.

Before the time the show started, we get on the bus hired by Materail College and we talked a lot on the road, about TV, driving exam, movies, novels and so on. And she tell me the captain teacher, that who really like the show, the art and literature.

When we arrived in Wenchang Camp, the theatre is neally full filled. And there are many my classmates, Jin, Ren, Jiao, Wu and so on.

In the show, there is an interlude, the song from Skeeter Davis— ‘the end of the world’, the song I really like, (And this song is used in Hanhan’s film — Hou Hui Wu Qi, It means ‘never meet again’. And it is used in ‘Under the Doom’ too. )

When we got back to the Nanhu Camp, I lent my onda pad for Yan, Cause I found she did not get throuth the driving exam and had a android pad not used for a long time, though that time I found my pad’s battery is empty, and the app was uninstalled.

What a happy day and a meaningful experience, and thanks God to give me this happy experience and such beautiful friendship.

And thanks Yan’s help.
